forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 2pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 73, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 8 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 3am, then rain showers likely and patchy fog. Cloudy. Low around 50, with temperatures rising to around 53 overnight. South southeast wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 2pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Cloudy, with a high near 70. South wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 2am, then rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 43. Southwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain before 5pm, then freezing rain likely and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a high near 32. East wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms before 10pm, then freezing rain and rain showers. Cloudy, with a low around 29. East wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain before 1pm, then freezing rain and rain between 1pm and 2pm, then rain and a slight chance of sleet. Cloudy. High near 36, with temperatures falling to around 34 in the afternoon. East wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain before 2am, then a chance of freezing rain and a chance of rain and snow. Cloudy, with a low around 24. Northeast wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Today

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs with over a foot of snow since Thursday. Upper loops powertilled and tracked again Monday AM. Mid-winter type conditions should continue through the weekend.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed on Tuesday morning. Expect firm snow in the morning that will transition to softer snow late in the day.
nubsNob.comments: The wet snow from yesterday has firmed up overnight. Expect hard snow this morning that will soften around noon. The best skiing this morning is back on Pintail Peak as that was groomed last. The wind is up from the East today. Coverage on all of our snowmaking runs continues to be very good. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
